promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a massive strong lizard steel-type with ornate scales. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armortail, a massive strong lizard steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: magnet-bomb, searing-sunraze-smash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lizard or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lizard-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Armortail is an imposing titan of the mountains, armed with powerful magnets and a searingly bright beam. Its power is unrivaled.
